ONBOARDING_1_TEXT: We make it simple for you to find restaurants around you.
ONBOARDING_2_TEXT: We provide a way to evaluate restaurants from other's point of view.
ONBOARDING_3_TEXT: See available offerings and order at your fingertips.
ONBOARDING_4_TEXT: Want to split the check? Just pay from your phone.
ONBOARDING_5_TEXT: Get your food delivered to your table just like that!
